changes.change: Fixed UI Language detection in installer.
Added newer FFMPEG from https://github.com/BtbN/FFmpeg-Builds/releases to installer, removed some older ones from the selection.
Added check if HLAE is manually installed in unsuitable folder #398

Changed FFMPEG URLs in HLAE_Setup.exe to https://github.com/advancedfx/ffmpeg.zeranoe.com-builds-mirror because https://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/ is closing down, see https://twitter.com/Zeranoe/status/1300596971934224385 - thanks to https://github.com/wordlesswind for informing us about the issue.
Fixed version number / HLAE.exe packaging in installer.
Added version number in title and VERSION file.
Changes / updates in HLAE build process.

Adjusted to 7/9/2020 CS:GO update: File - Lauch CS:GO will work automatically now.
People using custom loader will need to add the following lines in environment variables section (and might need to adjust the path to the Steam folder):
SteamPath=C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam
SteamClientLaunch=1
SteamGameId=730
SteamAppId=730
SteamOverlayGameId=730

Installer improvements:
- Closes #351 HLAE_Setup.exe / Installer:
- Easier to find option to change folder
- License conditions removed, since there are none
- Option to remove APPDATA folder
- Closes #356 (ffmpeg / installer related):
- Repeated installations don't need to reinstall FFMPEG if not wanted.
- Allows selecting existing FFMPEG installation
- Allows to select different builds.
Fixed installer to use system web proxy settings for downloading FFMPEG.
Fixed hu installer translations not being used.

Fixed Voronoi color table generator:
- Fixed some bugs.
- Weights are now used to weight the region size / shape, instead of the interpolation.
- Default example weights are now 1 / 2 (old 1 / 128) in order to make sense with new usage.

Fixed #301 CS:GO Steam overlay screenshot (F12) does not work anymore when game is not launched from official Steam Library entry (CS:GO 2020-03-26 pre-release / silent update) by adding SteamOverlayGameId=730 to environment variables for launching CS:GO.
Custom loader now has an option to set additional environment variables.
-addEnv option for custom loader HLAE command line options (can be used multiple times to add multiple vars).
Fixed installer failing for non-translated languages.
Fixed injector popping up unwanted developer test messages.
Added translations of installer and most of HLAE.exe GUI by the generous translators: https://l10n.advancedfx.org/projects/l10n/contributors/
Added a help / guide button at the bottom of the GUI.
Added possible solutions to more error codes.
Recompiled with latest Visual Studio 16.4.2 and packaged with latest CRT - now requires at least Windows 7. (Windows XP is not supported anymore.)
Fixed wrong content of ffmpeg/readme.advancedfx.txt. Thanks https://steamcommunity.com/id/lasamlg/
Changed Installer (HLAE_Setup.exe) to address #241 Installer improvement.

changes.changed: Added pt-pt translation by https://github.com/DMTWENTYTHREE to core installer.

changes.change: Added #224 fi-FI translation for installer, thanks https://github.com/markusforss
Added #221 partial pt-PT translation for installer, thanks https://github.com/DMTWENTYTHREE
Fixed missing and mixed up files in HLAE_Setup.exe (installer version).
Fixed HLAE_Setup.exe loading in wrong language.
Added zn-CH translations to installer. (Thanks to Purple-CSGO and tediorelee!)
Changed config load/save behavior: hlaeconfig.xml in HLAE application folder will have priority, otherwise the one in %APPDATA%\HLAE is used.
Custom loader now detects if paths are relative to HLAE folder and stores them accordingly, so that moving the folder doesn't break it (#200).
Added installer (based on https://wixtoolset.org) in order to solve issue #65 (Non-ASCII chracters in HLAE install location can cause problems).

Changed config loading and saving behaviour:
First tries to load %APPDATA%\HLAE\hlaeconfig.xml, if that is not possible will try to load it from HLAE.exe folder.
Config will be saved to %APPDATA%\HLAE\hlaeconfig.xml.
Fixed HLAE.exe not opening due to a typo in the update check GUID.
Removed AfxHookUnity: This is now included as DLL in the Unity project and doesn't need to be injected anymore.
Fixes #144: Remove hl process check from AfxHookGoldSrc Launcher.cs in HLAE.exe.

release.name: HLAE
release.comments: Thanks for the Christmas greetings and Merry Christmas to you too (unless it would offend you).

changes.change: Fixed unable to disable the GoldSrc optimize visibility feature bug. Thanks to https://github.com/juicejuicejuice for pull request #105

release.name: HLAE
release.comments:
Since we did at full rebuild at HLAE 2.54.0 (including the injector.exe and x64/injector.exe), several anti-virus programs might report false positives!
If this is a problem for you, or you are unsure, you can use the previous HLAE 2.53.1 (2018-08-07T06:15Z) until the situation calms down.
If you are using Windows Defender and run into problems:
1) Make sure to install the latest definitions: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/wdsi/definitions
2) Reboot.
3) Re-download and re-extract HLAE in your HLAE folder.

release.name: HLAE
release.comments:
Since this is a full rebuild (including the injector.exe and x64/injector.exe), several anti-virus programs might report false positives!
If this is a problem for you, or you are unsure, you can use the previous HLAE 2.53.1 (2018-08-07T06:15Z) until the situation calms down.
If you are using Windows Defender and run into problems:
1) Make sure to install the latest definitions: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/wdsi/definitions
2) Reboot.
3) Re-download and re-extract HLAE in your HLAE folder.

release.name: HLAE
release.comments:
This release is for the #PanoramaUI CS:GO branch .
Please help testing it and report (new) issues not known yet on GitHub:
https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/issues
https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/projects/1

release.name: HLAE
release.comments:
This release is for the #PanoramaUI CS:GO branch.
Please help testing it and report (new) issues not known yet on GitHub:
https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/issues
https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/projects/1

release.name: HLAE

changes.change: Fixed mistake in x64/AfxHook.dat preventing injection to work on 64 bit processes.

release.comments:
This release is for the #PanoramaUI branch.
Please help testing it and report (new) issues not known yet on GitHub:
https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/issues
(The mirv_deathmsg features have been temporarily disabled until we manage to fix them.)

changes.change: Updated to Microsoft Visual Studio 2017 version 15.7.3. Rebuild.
Updated HLAE.exe to have a (hopefully) better error dialogue.
Fixed cosmetic problem of auto update check not being ticked accordingly in menu, when user answers the question if to enable auto updates.
Updated the build with the latest Visual Studio 2017 version / UCRT / ....

Removed AfxHookGoldSrc and all related tools: https://twitter.com/dtugend/status/884780856929341442
The code and downloads of the last version with AfxHookGoldSrc support can be found here: https://github.com/ripieces/advancedfx/tree/v2.34.5

Fixed mistake in 2.30.3 that would cause HLAE launching not to work at all. Sorry for this embarrassing mistake. Thanks to those that notified me early, so the malfunctioning version could be retracted quickly.
Updated injector.exe, x64\injector.exe and HLAE.exe to have more helpful error information for users (hopefully).
Updated build environment to Visual Studio 2017.
Added capability to inject multiple DLLs with Custom Loader.

Added -noGui option for -csgoLauncher, -afxHookGoldSrc and -customLoader command line options:
When specified the HLAE.exe GUI won't be started at all - since HLAE exits as soon as the requested operations have been carried out, it's not possible to tell errors that might happen later on in the game / target process being launched. You can check the HLAE.exe process ExitCode to determine if the requested operations are being carried out successful so far (0) or failed for sure (1).

Reverted to old injection method, since otherwise there will be even more trouble with the UCRT again (on systems where it is not present, basically several UCRT DLLs ignore the alternate DLL search order). Combined it partially with new method, so we hopefully get the best result possible.

Fixed HLAE injection method causing Windows to load potentially incompatible DLLs from the system folders (i.e. vcruntime140.dll) instead of those supplied in the HLAE folder. Please note: We cannot do much about ucrtbase.dll and similar DLLs being loaded from the Windows folder if present there at the moment: https://connect.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/feedback/details/2725185/ucrt-function-forwarders-ignore-setdlldirectory-and-make-it-unsuitable-for-side-by-side-deployment
Fixed HLAE not working on Windows XP.

release.name: HLAE
release.comments: We are aware that HLAE currently doesn't work on Windows XP anymore lately, we'll try to release another update that addresses that.

release.name: HLAE
release.comments: We are aware that HLAE currently doesn't work on Windows XP anymore lately, we'll try to release another update that addresses that.

changes.change: Testing workaround for UCRT problems with SetDllDirectory (using SetCurrentDirectory instead).
Updated build environment to Visual Studio 2015, should still run on Windows XP (target is v140_xp).
Fixed specific launcher dialog for CS:GO in File menu not working! Sorry about this.

Added specific launcher dialog for CS:GO in File menu! This allows to set a movie making config parent folder. The launcher will also be exposed to the HLAE command line options, which will be documented in the HLAE manual.
Fixed command line option for -afxHookGoldSrc, renamed -foreceAlpha to -forceAlpha, this is a breaking change, -foreceAlpha is deprecated and will trigger a warning message box.
Fixed 64 bit versions of msvcp100.dll, msvcr100.dll being packaged instead of 32 bit versions.

Updated launcher for GoldSrc games (AfxHookGoldSrc) to display a warning icon and information if game resolution height is bellow 480 pixels, since then the Half-Life's TrackerScheme.res would need to be adjusted aka an EngineFont for bellow 480 pixels would need to be added, otherwise text (i.e. death notice text) will be missing in-game.

release.name: HLAE

changes.change: Fixed writing of hlaeconfig.xml failing randomly, due to the file stream for reading it not being closed deterministically beforehand.

release.comments:
We are aware of a small number of Windows 8 / 8.1 users that have random crashes and freezes (i.e. when loading a demo) with HLAE / AfxHookSource.
If you are affected by it, consider contacting us in the appropriate forum thread: http://advancedfx.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1666

changes.change: Turns out Visual Studio 2010 SP1 was not properly installed on the build computer, reinstalled it and updated or rebuild all files included in the HLAE download accordingly. Hopefully this fixes some problems on Windows 8 some users are experiencing i.e. with AfxHookSource (but maybe not).
Changelog entries specific to AfxHookGoldSrc has been separated from the HLAE changelog to avoid user confusion.
Added several command line options to HLAE to allow automatic launching of the CustomLoader. The command line options will be documented in the HLAEwiki in the Interfaces section or s.th. alike.

release.name: HLAE
release.comments: AfxHookSource users: Please check that you are adding -insecure +sv_lan 1 to the launch options when launching, to avoid getting VAC banned! The defaults for HLAE have been changed accordingly, however if hlaeconfig.xml already exists default are overriden.

changes.change: Added promotion for the Creative Minds Editing Competition.

Added several command line options to HLAE to allow automatic launching (of AfxHookGoldSrc) without having to use .NET remoting. The command line options will be documented in the HLAEwiki in the Interfaces section or s.th. alike.

release.name: HLAE
release.comments: AfxHookSource users will notice a bink*.dll missing error, which has to be addressed in a further release.

changes.change: Added ignore update button for update check.
Ported parts of the GUI to CSharp in order to make coding easier for other coders.

Set Logical Name properties of .resx resources to avoid clashes with VC100 resource naming convention (would cause the DemoTools dialog to fail with System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException).

release.name: HLAE

changes.change: Changed injection process to cope with flat DLL deployment layout.

release.comments:
This release includes a compatible version of AfxHookSource (due to changed DLL dependencies).
Greetz and thanks to Martin Vassie.

release.name: HLAE

changes.change: Fixed hlae.exe and hl.exe processes not closing when closing the HLAE window.

release.comments: More bugs than features lately, eh? Good thing we count those as features too, meh. :|

release.name: HLAE
release.comments: The release today went a bit unlucky. Sorry about that. This update is still not perfect, but okay for now.

release.name: HLAE
release.comments: *sigh*

changes.change: Fixed GUI menu overlaying part of game window.
Added simple obligatory update check notification.

release.name: HLAE
release.comments: Greetz to: msthavoc, xorN.

changes.change: Minor DemoTools update: drag n drop, batch to folder.

release.name: HLAE

changes.change: removed "-demoedit" from the default launch options since it may cause high memory usage, performance hits and instability, while only a share of HLAE users use it
improved skymanager: now supports a few .tga formats (24/32bit color uncompressed), flat mode single click selects image / sky, flat mode double click imports image

release.comments: Thanks to: Joakim, juGGaKNot, msthavoc

release.name: HLAE

changes.change: added HLAE Sky Manager, located in Tools menu,

release.comments: Thx to msthavoc and juGGaKNot for testing.

changes.change: changed IDE to VC++ 2008 Express Ed.
fixed private side by side CRT assembly version mismatch
fixed bug with selection of custom mods (thx to Fana)
changed launcher: made selection of custom mods more obvious again
added crappy calculator to the tools menu
added crappy check to the launcher if HL is already running
added possibility for other tools (i.e. demo players) to interface with HLAE. This feature will be documented in the HLAEwiki online manual in the appendix section (including source code)
fixed bug that would invert the fullscreen checkbox behavior
re-added temporary fullscreen option (use with care, might go away in the future again)
rolls out the .NET 2.0 based launcher (former 2008-10-19 beta) Thus Microsoft .NET 2.0 framework is required.

release.name: HLAE

changes.change: appended historical changelogs to the changelog

release.comments:
CU in November or somewhen.
Thx to 'juggaknot' for having helped moderating the forum a bit.
PS: MIRVIN_Monkey rulz!

changes.change: removed unused output panel in old public gui

release.name: HLAE
release.comments: Greetz: Martin Vaissie

changes.change: Fixed typo in launcher that would cause problems when launching TFC mod

linked MS VC++ Runtime to the hlae.exe to avoid users being unable to launch HLAE (They saw the error message "This application has failed to start because the application configuration is incorrect. Reinstalling the application may fix this problem.") Not the nicest way to fix this, but does it for now. Thx to azrazr for testing.
Added missing file to download, in case you already downloaded 2.0.1 please re-download! Sorry : )

release.name: HLAE

changes.change: Added: Icon (thx to guys that programed Inkscape and GIMP 2)

release.comments:
This is release is mainly for making the HLAE Gui more reliable, thus we'll also stop offering two different versions (stable and pre-release).
Thanks to: msthavoc and MN|vadoskin for testing, neomic and ripieces for coding, Valve for not suing us( yet). The HLAE forum users for their creative input, we hope we'll be able to add at least some of the things being suggested in the future, but we won't promise anything (as always).

release.name: HLAE pre-release

changes.change: Changed: The MDT project has now been renamed to Half-Life Advanced Effects (HLAE)
Added: The HLAE Graphical User Interface, which will be extended in the future. The GUI is based on wxWidgets ( http://www.wxwidgets.org/ ).
Changed: The MDTloader has been integrated into the HLAE Gui. Select File->Launch from the menu to bring it up.

Added: DemoTools: select Tools->Demo Tool form the menu.
This tool migrates 2 old tools into the GUI:
DemoCleanup by MirvinMonkey:
Remove scoreboard, commandmenu, ...
Added ability to block other commands too.
Half-Life Demo Fix by ripieces:
Repair demos that were recorded while the game crashed. Added ability to repair more than 2 segments.
And adds a new one:
dem_forcehltv 1 camera stuck fix:
Tries to fix the camera being stuck when using dem_forcehltv 1 with some in-eye demos.

release.comments:
As always the following text contains many mistakes (as most changelog entries) due to lack of time and dedication to writing changelogs.
Thanks to: Everyone (including you). iD Software, matrixstorm, MetaMod, Microsoft, Valve Software, wxWidgets. Uwe Gierlich for his informations about the Half-Life .dem file format. Mirvin_Monkey for creating the former MDT. neomic for his enormous work on the HLAE Gui. Myself (ripieces) for wasting so much time on this project.

changes.change: The MDT Loader.exe has been updated and will try to remember some of the settings made when launching a game with it in extended mode and will set them for the next time. Except the selection of the loader mode all loader settings should be remembered.

release.name: MDT XMAS 2007
release.comments:
Hello, this is a special Christmas release :D
At first we want to hint you to the HLAEwiki*, which already contains the Mirv Demo Tool command reference and will be extended in the future: http://www.hhg-clan.de/hlae/wiki
Along some bonus tools you normally have to download separately (check the bonus folder in the zip) we also added some sweet extra candy to MDT itself:
A built-in WallHack system : P
Thanks and greets too:
C-M|s0nkite ( www.mattepainting.gr )
for supplying the merry_xmas.jpg that is included in the download!
msthavoc ( www.mst-gaming.de )
for helping now and then with testing mdt and making tutorials :)
Merry X-Mas to you guys then,
have fun, cya next year.
* it's HLAEwiki, because MDT might get renamed in the far away future to Half-Life Advanced Effects : )

changes.change: Added: A new loader! The old one is still available here: http://www.madabouthats.org/downloads/mdt-old-loader.zip Please email me if you have trouble with the new one.
Have also un-UPX packed the loader, hopefully this will fix the false virus alarms.
